content:
Check:
  all:
    - domain: is_not_contained_by
      operator: get_dataset
      value:
        comparator: $MedDRA_SOC
        target: --SOC
Core:
  Id: CDISC.SDTMIG.CG0436
  Version: '1'
  Status: Draft
Description: Verify that --SOC matches MedDRA primary system organ class
Operations:
  - domain: MedDRA
    id: $MedDRA_SOC
    name: SOC
    operator: distinct
Outcome:
  Message: --SOC must equal MedDRA primary system organ class
Rule Type: Record Data
Sensitivity: Record
Authorities:
  - Organization: CDISC
    Standards:
      - Name: SDTMIG
        Version: '3.4'
        References:
          - Origin: SDTM and SDTMIG Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: CG0436
              Version: '1'
            Version: '2.0'
            Citations:
              - Cited Guidance: The system organ class from the primary hierarchy
                  assigned in the MedDRA dictionary.
                Document: Model v2.0
                Item: --SOC
                Section: Events
Scope:
  Classes:
    Include:
      - EVENTS
  Domains:
    Include:
      - AE
      - MH
      - CE

json.Description: Verify that --SOC matches MedDRA primary system organ class

Outcome.Message: --SOC must equal MedDRA primary system organ class

Citations.Cited_Guidance: The system organ class from the primary hierarchy assigned in the MedDRA dictionary.
